website_summaries.verdict: This model offers a lot of style and convenience for the price, but the quality is only average.
pros: Goggles get high marks for their rugged features including anti-scratch lens protection and Isotron face foam
Available in numerous stylish colors, frame, and lens options
cons: The lenses are slightly smaller, resulting in less effective peripheral vision

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, doesn't fog too badly under most circumstances. ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, doesn't fog too badly under most circumstances. Not a fan of the "happy lens" at all. In daytime everything is a nasty orange and in low light I can't see anything. That's just a lens preference though, not a problem with the rest of the goggle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not good with bern helmet
customer_reviews.text: Constant fog up after I put a neck gater on and warm air rising from my breath. Could be my helmet set up not allowing enough airflow from top. Never had an issue with my smiths tho. Also, they didn't fit well under my helmet and kept pressing down on my nose. I have a bern helmet
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goggles. Never fogged up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goggles. Never fogged up. Lenses are easy to change. Also, I like the lenses that came with it. They are light enough to be okay on a cloudy day, but definitely dark enough for the sunniest of days. My only complaint is that I wish the strap was a pinch longer. I have a medium sized helmet, and I had to have them on the loosest setting to fit on the outside of my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality lens
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent quality lens. Really nice view-angle. Very light-weight and comfortable frame. No fog. Cons: Scratched by only touching once my helmet on the first use. But it didn't affect my view. Comes with 2 lenses. I haven't used s1 lens yet. I used s3 lens (blue one) in both heavy-snow, and sunny weathers, it was perfect in both conditions. Not too dark, not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super rad goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are hot! The colors are pattern look awesome. The tint of the goggles worked best on bluebird days. I had a slight challenge seeing on the slopes on a very overcast day. Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TwinkieMama

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Steal at 40$
customer_reviews.text: I have owned virtually every brand of goggle on the market over the past 20 years. I love Electric and Dragon and find Oakley way over-rated due to market share. If money is no object, go with a high end goggle from Dragon. However, Spy is the most underrated brand out there. The build quality of the Marshall is equal if not better than every other brand at this price-point. I am a huge fan of Dadali, so his pro model priced at 40$ bucks is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: xavier

customer_reviews.title: These are BIG
customer_reviews.text: I never got the chance to use these as I returned them due to a defect, but they are nice quality goggles and the happy lens seems like it'd be great out on the slopes. My only complaint is that they were pretty large for my face being a girl, but overall a top notch goggle.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, quality strap
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles! Used on a bright day, worked great. Came with a black sunny day lense as well
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: price was high but Spy happy lenses are the best and you get TWO!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: like most of the 2015 models did
customer_reviews.text: Wish these came with the extra lens, like most of the 2015 models did, but my wife loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Graber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy Lens! Works like a charm and not too large on my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Use them for Snowplowing.
customer_reviews.text: I use them when running my snowblower. That is what I bought them for and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpa

customer_reviews.title: Seem like just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them out in the winter season yet, but seem like they will be just what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Only got to use then once so far but i got lots of compliments on then on the slopes!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tamoroso19

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice goggles but put no much pressure on my sinuses while wearing so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Loigman

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great pair of goggles. Just know that the lens aren't completely mirrored in the green/blue lens. Would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Conner McCroskey

customer_reviews.title: Fogged with helmet wear
customer_reviews.text: While really stylish, these fogged on me which was highly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The clarity is superior and i didn't have any problems with fogging
customer_reviews.text: The clarity is superior and i didn't have any problems with fogging. Y had to change lenses on my first day and was very easy to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they look great, fit great and were a good deal for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit nice, Not as big as I thought, Lence isnt green as picture shows. clear blueish purple
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. No fogging up issues. The lense they come with works fine as a all-purpose lense, even when overcast
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and the price was awesome. Fast shipping, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Weber

customer_reviews.title: These goggles were awesome. Granted
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were awesome. Granted, I'm a novice skier so I have only used them on a long weekend trip. They have a nice clean and sexy look.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. Two days in breckenridge and they didnt fog ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Two days in breckenridge and they didnt fog once and were amazing
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were exactly what I needed. They worked ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were exactly what I needed. They worked well, protected my eyes, and I could see clearly through them. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: aujillm

customer_reviews.title: Goggles are great, Seller......maybe not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Goggles are great and look amazing, but it was supposed to include additional lenses. None were included. I feel like I've been ripped off as I purchased the Tokyo Rose Multi Lense pack. Multi = more than one. Even the packaging indicates there should be 2 additional lenses. False advertising. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kbernardi

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles I've ever invested in
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles I've ever invested in. I've been skiing and boarding since I was a kid and these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: colenotn

product_meta.title: SPY Optic Marshall Snow Goggles
product_meta.description: Take the law into your own hand (and head) in the mid-large Marshall. Not too big, not too small. Sometimes things are just right.. The Marshall is custom built from a flexible polyurethane frame and features patented Scoop ventilation system, anti-fog 5.5 ARC spherical dual-lens system with anti-scratch protection, triple-layer Isotron face foam with moisture-wicking Dri-force fleece, silicone-ribbed strap, 100% UV protection and is helmet compatible with the most popular helmets on the planet.
feature_bullets: Anti-fog 5.5 base ARC spherical dual lens
Triple layer Isotron face foam with moisture-wicking Dri-Force fleece
